attributes.action: ban the use of artificial colours, flavours and sweeteners in prescription medicines for babies and children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the government to ban the inclusion of artificial colours, flavours and sweeteners in children's prescription medicines such as infant antibiotic solutions/suspensions. These additives can cause adverse reactions in children and could be safely replaced using natural colours and flavours plus a less harmful sweetener such as sucralose.
